Kim Kardashian

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 8.2/10 (40 votes cast)

Kim Kardashian is the second born Kardashian sister and co-founder of DASH Boutiques. Kim is also an American socialite, television personality, model, actress and businesswoman (according to Kim Kardashian Wikipedia Page)



Image courtesy of blogs.glam.com

DASH Kim Kardashian

In addition to being a founder and main spokesperson of DASH Boutiques, Kim Kardashian has a very busy career. With numerous endorsemnt deals with several national brands, Kim seems to be the most brand popular of all the three Kardashian sisters. If you see DASH Kim Kardashian clothing online, other than K-DASH on QVC or Kardashian Kollection through Sears, it is probably NOT authentic. There are a few clothing products by BeBe as well. DASH Kim Kardashian counterfeit goods are on the rise, so be weary when shopping online.

Kim Kardashian Modeling

Since her nude appearance in a 2007 edition of Playboy magazine, Kim Kardashian has landed several modeling gigs in the fashion world. These experiences have led to larger scale business, retail, and film ventures.

Some Of These Include:

  • Facemodel with Bongo Jeans in 2008
  • Product endorsement deal with ShoeDazzle in 2009
  • The Face of the Fusion Beauty “Kiss Away Poverty” Campaign in September 2009
  • Workout DVD collaboration with trainers Jennifer Galardi and Patrick Goudeau< in 2010
  • K-DASH Clothing line with QVC in 2010
  • Kardashian Kollection clothing and accessories line with Sears in 2011
  • Spokeswoman for Quick Trim dietary supplement

Kim Kardashian D-A-S-H co-founder

Kim Kardashian Personal Life

Kim Kardashian was married in the year 2000 to music producer Damon Thomas. This marriage lasted four years and ended in divorce in 2004. Kim Kardashian has had relationships since with other personalities in the media. Shortly after her divorce there was Ray J, brother of singer Brandy. More recently short lived marriage to NBA Basketball player Kris Humphries. This marriage ended in divorce as well – less than three months after their much publicized wedding in 2011.

Kim Kardashian Means Business
